name: Shifty Funky Space
description:
After your mission ended, You are lost in the outer Rim.
Now, you want to return HOME.

Change the shape of your ship by tapping it.
Pass the portals in perfect shape.

Good Luck!

Made during the Global Game Jam 2019.
Download for free on Apple App Store and Google Play.

Artwork: Kenney.nl, Beffio
Soundtrack: Joe.G.Burbach . “The Race” (Bandcamp)
